alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 9:37AM CST until March 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. .Minor flooding continues on the Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. The river has crested and is beginning to slowly fall. The river will fall below flood stage early Friday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 23.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and then continue falling. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
